snippet: President Hugo Chávez, who voiced his suspicions that the man could be a “mercenary” plotting to destabilize the country, did not identify the man or detail the accusations against him.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez says authorities have detained an American citizen and are interrogating him, voicing suspicions that the man could be a mercenary plotting to destabilize the country; does not identify the man or detail the accusations against him.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez, who voiced his suspicions that the man could be a “mercenary” plotting to destabilize the country, did not identify the man or detail the accusations against him.

headline.main: Venezuela: American Citizen Detained, Chávez Says
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: American Citizen Detained, Chávez Says
